description:
System76 Linux-powered Adder WS laptop gets an HX-Class 14th Gen Intel CPU, up to 12TB M.2 NVMe SSD storage, NVIDIA 40 Series graphics, and up to 96GB DDR5 RAM.

The post System76 Refreshes Its Adder WS Linux Laptop with an HX-Class 14th Gen Intel CPU appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: System76 Refreshes Its Adder WS Linux Laptop with an HX-Class 14th Gen Intel CPU
